incident_updates.body: As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer. Start time : 08/07/2024 06:00 UTC End time : 12/07/2024 16:00 UTC Service impact : Management unavailable for 1h and all hosts will be put in maintenance (Vmotion). Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade for hosts and vCenter Server services . An individual communication will be sent before the upgrade begins. Thank you for your understanding.

incident_updates.body: As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud storage offer. Start time : 09/07/2024 04:30 UTC End time : 09/07/2024 08:30 UTC Service impact : You may experience micro cuts during maintenance. Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we are going to update multiple servers to a newer and more stable version. Thank you for your understanding.
